title: General
fullText:
This Clause sets out requirements for wiring EP earthing systems in new cardiac-protected electrical areas.
An EP terminal(s) stud shall not be installed except as test points (see Clause 4.4.2.10).
NOTES:
1	Requirements for alterations to the EP earthing system in existing installations are specified in Section 6.
2	Information on calculating the cross-sectional area of earthing conductors used in EP earthing systems is provided in Appendix D.
